<h1 align="center">
  Morosoft React Bootstrap template
</h1>

## Quick start

1. Clone the repository by running
```bash
  git clone https://code.morosoftwebsites.com/react-bootstrap-templates/resume-gatsby.git
```
2. Install dependencies
```bash
  npm install
```

3. Launch the program by either running

```bash
  npm start
```
Or
```bash
  gatsby develop
```

If all goes well you can visit the site at
 _http://localhost:8000_
